channel.title: How do you make someone Donator?
channel.description: How can i make someone donator?

item.title: How do you make someone Donator?
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Usually in 317s, there’s a command for making someone a Donator. Try looking for one in your client.java, if there isn’t one, do what Usagi said. Make sure the player is logged out before editing their character files though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make someone Donator?

item.title: How do you make someone Donator?
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Depends if your using a server that has it inbuilt or not. If it does go into their character data file and find the donator option and change it to ‘1’. If its not in there, then obviously your server has not got it built in and you will have to put it in yourself. Which there are many tutorials explaining how to do.[/font]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make someone Donator?
